name: Tailwind

unions.name: Tailwind
unions.comment:
A type representing a Tailwind CSS class or set of classes.

While the constructor is exposed for internal use by Tailwind.Breakpoints,
you should use the utility functions in this module to create values
rather than constructing them directly.

values.name: batch
values.comment:
Combine multiple Tailwind values into one.

Useful for defining reusable style groups:

    buttonStyles : Tailwind
    buttonStyles =
        batch
            [ Tw.px s4
            , Tw.py s2
            , Tw.rounded
            , Tw.bg_color (blue s500)
            , hover [ Tw.bg_color (blue s600) ]
            ]

values.name: bg_color
values.comment:
Set background color.

    bg_color (blue s100)

    bg_color (gray s50)

values.name: bg_simple
values.comment:
Set background color using a simple color.

    bg_simple white

values.name: border_color
values.comment:
Set border color.

    border_color (gray s300)

    border_color (slate s200)

values.name: border_simple
values.comment:
Set border color using a simple color.

    border_simple black

values.name: classes
values.comment:
Convert a list of Tailwind values to an Html.Attribute.

This is the main entry point for using Tailwind classes in your view:

    import Tailwind as Tw exposing (classes)
    import Tailwind.Breakpoints exposing (hover, md)
    import Tailwind.Theme exposing (blue, s4, s500, s8)

    view =
        div
            [ classes
                [ Tw.flex
                , Tw.items_center
                , Tw.p s4
                , Tw.bg_color (blue s500)
                , hover [ Tw.opacity_75 ]
                , md [ Tw.p s8 ]
                ]
            ]
            [ text "Hello!" ]

values.name: gap
values.comment:
Gap between flex/grid items.

    gap s4 -- produces "gap-4"

values.name: h
values.comment:
Height from spacing scale.

    h s32 -- produces "h-32" (8rem)

values.name: m
values.comment:
Margin on all sides.

    m s4 -- produces "m-4" (1rem)

values.name: p
values.comment:
Padding on all sides.

    p s4 -- produces "p-4" (1rem)

values.name: raw
values.comment:
Escape hatch for arbitrary class names not covered by the API.

    raw "custom-class"

    raw "[scroll-snap-type:x_mandatory]" -- Tailwind arbitrary value syntax

Use sparingly - these won't be type-checked!

values.name: text_color
values.comment:
Set text color.

    text_color (blue s500)

    text_color (gray s800)

values.name: text_simple
values.comment:
Set text color using a simple color.

    text_simple white

values.name: toClass
values.comment:
Extract the class string from a Tailwind value.

Useful for interop with other libraries or debugging.

values.name: w
values.comment:
Width from spacing scale.

    w s64 -- produces "w-64" (16rem)

name: Tailwind.Breakpoints

values.name: active
values.comment:
Apply classes with active: variant.

    active [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "active:bg-blue-500 active:text-white"

values.name: dark
values.comment:
Apply classes with dark: variant.

    dark [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "dark:bg-blue-500 dark:text-white"

values.name: disabled
values.comment:
Apply classes with disabled: variant.

    disabled [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "disabled:bg-blue-500 disabled:text-white"

values.name: even
values.comment:
Apply classes with even: variant.

    even [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "even:bg-blue-500 even:text-white"

values.name: first
values.comment:
Apply classes with first: variant.

    first [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "first:bg-blue-500 first:text-white"

values.name: focus
values.comment:
Apply classes with focus: variant.

    focus [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "focus:bg-blue-500 focus:text-white"

values.name: focus_visible
values.comment:
Apply classes with focus-visible: variant.

    focus_visible [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "focus-visible:bg-blue-500 focus-visible:text-white"

values.name: focus_within
values.comment:
Apply classes with focus-within: variant.

    focus_within [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "focus-within:bg-blue-500 focus-within:text-white"

values.name: group_hover
values.comment:
Apply classes with group-hover: variant.

    group_hover [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "group-hover:bg-blue-500 group-hover:text-white"

values.name: hover
values.comment:
Apply classes with hover: variant.

    hover [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "hover:bg-blue-500 hover:text-white"

values.name: last
values.comment:
Apply classes with last: variant.

    last [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "last:bg-blue-500 last:text-white"

values.name: lg
values.comment:
Apply classes at the lg breakpoint (64rem) and above.

    lg [ Tw.flex, Tw.p s8 ]

produces classes like "lg:flex lg:p-8"

values.name: md
values.comment:
Apply classes at the md breakpoint (48rem) and above.

    md [ Tw.flex, Tw.p s8 ]

produces classes like "md:flex md:p-8"

values.name: n2xl
values.comment:
Apply classes at the 2xl breakpoint (96rem) and above.

    n2xl [ Tw.flex, Tw.p s8 ]

produces classes like "2xl:flex 2xl:p-8"

values.name: odd
values.comment:
Apply classes with odd: variant.

    odd [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "odd:bg-blue-500 odd:text-white"

values.name: sm
values.comment:
Apply classes at the sm breakpoint (40rem) and above.

    sm [ Tw.flex, Tw.p s8 ]

produces classes like "sm:flex sm:p-8"

values.name: visited
values.comment:
Apply classes with visited: variant.

    visited [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "visited:bg-blue-500 visited:text-white"

values.name: withVariant
values.comment:
Apply a custom variant prefix to a list of Tailwind values.

    withVariant "aria-selected" [ Tw.bg_color (blue s500), Tw.text_simple white ]

produces "aria-selected:bg-blue-500 aria-selected:text-white"

values.name: xl
values.comment:
Apply classes at the xl breakpoint (80rem) and above.

    xl [ Tw.flex, Tw.p s8 ]

produces classes like "xl:flex xl:p-8"

name: Tailwind.Theme

unions.name: Color
unions.comment:
A color value that can be used with color utilities like `text_color`, `bg_color`, etc.

Colors are either shaded (created by applying a shade to a color name like `blue s500`)
or simple (like `white`, `black`, `transparent`).

unions.name: Shade
unions.comment:
A color shade (50, 100, 200, ... 950).

Represents the lightness level where 50 is lightest and 950 is darkest.

unions.name: SimpleColor
unions.comment: A simple color without shades (white, black, transparent, etc.).

unions.name: Spacing
unions.comment: A Tailwind spacing value from the default scale.

values.name: amber
values.comment: Amber color. Apply a shade: `amber s500`

values.name: blue
values.comment: Blue color. Apply a shade: `blue s500`

values.name: colorToString
values.comment: Convert a Color to its CSS class string suffix.

values.name: currentColor
values.comment: Current color (inherits from text color). Usage: `border_simple currentColor`

values.name: cyan
values.comment: Cyan color. Apply a shade: `cyan s500`

values.name: emerald
values.comment: Emerald color. Apply a shade: `emerald s500`

values.name: fuchsia
values.comment: Fuchsia color. Apply a shade: `fuchsia s500`

values.name: gray
values.comment: Gray color. Apply a shade: `gray s500`

values.name: green
values.comment: Green color. Apply a shade: `green s500`

values.name: indigo
values.comment: Indigo color. Apply a shade: `indigo s500`

values.name: lime
values.comment: Lime color. Apply a shade: `lime s500`

values.name: neutral
values.comment: Neutral color. Apply a shade: `neutral s500`

values.name: orange
values.comment: Orange color. Apply a shade: `orange s500`

values.name: pink
values.comment: Pink color. Apply a shade: `pink s500`

values.name: purple
values.comment: Purple color. Apply a shade: `purple s500`

values.name: red
values.comment: Red color. Apply a shade: `red s500`

values.name: rose
values.comment: Rose color. Apply a shade: `rose s500`

values.name: shadeToString
values.comment: Convert a Shade to its CSS class string.

values.name: sky
values.comment: Sky color. Apply a shade: `sky s500`

values.name: slate
values.comment: Slate color. Apply a shade: `slate s500`

values.name: spacingToString
values.comment: Convert a Spacing value to its CSS class suffix.

values.name: stone
values.comment: Stone color. Apply a shade: `stone s500`

values.name: teal
values.comment: Teal color. Apply a shade: `teal s500`

values.name: violet
values.comment: Violet color. Apply a shade: `violet s500`

values.name: yellow
values.comment: Yellow color. Apply a shade: `yellow s500`

values.name: zinc
values.comment: Zinc color. Apply a shade: `zinc s500`
